parsed.title: O santo de plástico que virou brinquedo
parsed.summary: Um ícone sagrado transformado em brinquedo barato nas ruas, produzido em segredo e vendido em supermercados. Quem alimenta essa máquina de ódio e como a imagem sagrada se tornou mercadoria? O mistério persiste, revelando o poder dos sistemas que criam injustiças históricas.

scenes.narration: Um ícone sagrado, agora impresso em plástico barato, vendido nas ruas para crianças.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a childlike plastic figurine resembling a medieval saint, illuminated by cold blue light, deep shadows, placed on a cracked cobblestone street.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the figurine, dust particles drifting in dim light.
scenes.audioDescription: Ambient city murmur, distant church bells faint, subtle wind.

scenes.narration: Linhas de produção cintilam, mas ninguém vê quem as alimenta nos bastidores sombrios.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, interior of a medieval printing workshop, wooden presses glowing with ink, shadows looming over workers.
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle camera pan left across rows of wooden presses, ink glimmering, paper fluttering.
scenes.audioDescription: Metal clank of press, low hum of workers murmuring, creaking wood.

scenes.narration: Nas prateleiras, o santo infantil sorri ao lado de carrinhos de plástico, indiferente.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, supermarket aisle under harsh fluorescent light, the plastic saint figurine displayed among bright toy cars, other toys blurred.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow zoom in on figurine, neon lights flickering, shoppers' shadows passing quickly.
scenes.audioDescription: Soft cart wheels rolling, distant announcements, low ambient music.

scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, black void with faint static, The Gap Files logo faintly glowing in white.
scenes.motionDescription: Static fade-in of white text, lingering briefly.

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
